oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Legendary account of Musayyab ibn Najabah's activities to avenge the death of Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī.
bi-ihtimām-i Akmal Khān ibn Islām Khān.
According to introductory remarks, translated from Persian, which is in turn translated from Arabic.
